name: Filmmakers!
description:
Take over the movie world! Find new look and styling for actors, set up movie sets and film the next blockbuster!

Join your friends and other players around the world in this makeover challenge! Attack and raid other players to gather riches. Spin to win amazing treasures.


Game Features:

1. Makeover young actors
Help new actors to find a celebrity look – change hairstyles, makeup & clothes.

2. Build and develop film set
No one likes empty and old spaces. Build new floors, walls and fill rooms with designer furniture!

3. Attack and raid your friends
Your friend's place looks nice… nice enough to attack and destroy! Raid your friends to steal enough coins to build in your own locations! All is fair in love and war!

4. Hit the JackPot
Spin the wheel to earn epic loot. Every spin has a chance to win gigantic fortune. Feel the rush of excitement with every roll. Do you feel lucky?

5. New friends
Joins other players in teams and find new friends. Play together in team games and tournaments for even more riches!
